__TOC__

LightDM is the display manager used in Ubuntu.

== Acceptance Criteria ==

# Branch must compile
# Regression tests must succeed (make check)
# Able to log in with user that has a password (using Unity Greeter)
# Able to log in with user that has no password
# Able to log into guest session
# Able to switch users
# Able to log in user that is using encrypted home directories
